state: You are hungry! Let's cook a delicious meal. Check the cookbook in the kitchen for the recipe. Once done, enjoy your meal! -= Livingroom =- You find yourself in a livingroom. You see a sofa. Don't worry, there is no door. > -= Livingroom =-0/1

admissible_commands: put green bell pepper on sofa
put green hot pepper on sofa

next_state: -= Kitchen =- You find yourself in a kitchen. An usual one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. You can see a fridge, so there's that. The fridge contains a roasted pork chop, a red onion, a block of cheese and a yellow onion, so there's that. You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see an oven. You scan the room, seeing a table. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The table is massive. On the table you can see a cookbook and a knife. Something scurries by right in the corner of your eye. Probably nothing. You can make out a counter. You shudder, but continue examining the counter. On the counter you make out a tomato and a banana. You can make out a stove. The stove is conventional. But there isn't a thing on it. There is an open plain door leading south. You need an exit without a door? You should try going east. > -= Kitchen =-0/7

cook green bell pepper with stove
cook green hot pepper with oven
cook green hot pepper with stove
cook red bell pepper with oven
cook red bell pepper with stove
insert green bell pepper into fridge
insert green hot pepper into fridge
insert red bell pepper into fridge
put green bell pepper on counter
put green bell pepper on stove
put green bell pepper on table
put green hot pepper on counter
put green hot pepper on stove
put green hot pepper on table
put red bell pepper on counter
put red bell pepper on stove
put red bell pepper on table
take block of cheese from fridge
